characterTextSplitter.label: Character Text Splitter
characterTextSplitter.description: splits only on one type of character (defaults to "\n\n").

chunkSize.label: Chunk Size
chunkSize.description: Number of characters in each chunk. Default is 1000.

chunkOverlap.label: Chunk Overlap
chunkOverlap.description: Number of characters to overlap between chunks. Default is 200.

separator.label: Custom Separator
separator.description: Separator to determine when to split the text, will override the default separator

recursiveCharacterTextSplitter.label: Recursive Character Text Splitter
recursiveCharacterTextSplitter.description: splits text recursively by different characters - starting with the first character and then the second character and so on.

chunkSize.label: Chunk Size
chunkSize.description: Number of characters in each chunk. Default is 1000.

chunkOverlap.label: Chunk Overlap

separators.label: Custom Separators
